addToken: INSERT INTO userToken(tokenID, userID, tokenStr) VALUES ('{tokenID}', '{userID}', '{tokenStr}')
deleteTokenID: DELETE FROM userToken where tokenID = '{User Entered tokenID}'
addUser: INSERT INTO userTable(userID, userName, userEmail, userPassword) VALUES ('{userID}', '{userName}','{userEmail}','{userPassword}')
addNotes: INSERT INTO userNotes(notesID, Title, Content, ownerID) VALUES ('{notesID}', '{Title}', '{Content}', '{ownerID}')
updateTitle: UPDATE userNotes SET Title = '{Title}' where notesID = '{notesID}'
